changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "attestations" ( "uuid" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, "attestation_anpe_number" VARCHAR(255), "attestation_cnss_number" VARCHAR(255), "attestation_anpe_date" DATE, "attestation_cnss_date" DATE, "number" VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE, "expiration_date" TIMESTAMP, "document_request_id" INT PRIMARY KEY , "created_at" TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, "document_path" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY ("document_request_id") REFERENCES "document_requests" ("id") );
